subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The early hours of the first round of the N.H.L. entry draft proceeded without any major surprises — at least until the Rangers picked center J. T. Miller at No. 15
snippet: The early hours of the first round of the N.H.L. entry draft proceeded without any major surprises — at least until the Rangers picked center J. T. Miller at No. 15
